channel.title: GameSpot presents On the Spot
channel.description: On the Spot is a live interactive weekly show featuring the latest and greatest in gaming, coming to you straight from the GameSpot offices.
channel.itunes:author: GameSpot.com

item.author: support@gamespot.com
item.description: This week we check out Wallace & Gromit Episode 2, Space Invaders Extreme, test our rhythm skills with Let's Tap, and ride off into the sunset with Call of Juarez: Bound in Blood.

item.title: On the Spot - 11/13/08
item.author: support@gamespot.com
item.description: You're In The Movies is going to put us on the silver screen, and we're going to lend our voices to Lips for the soundtrack. The Prince of Persia is back to run, jump, flip, and otherwise overcome the obstacles, and we've got early looks at the New Xbox Experience as well as the DSi and PSP 3000. In short, we're going to bring you another awesome On the Spot!

item.title: On the Spot - 10/10/08
item.author: support@gamespot.com
item.description: We've got coverage from Tokyo as our team digs in deep to get you the best coverage anywhere of the TGS from the ground up. We're going to see more on Halo 3: Recon, Halo Wars, Patapon 2, LocoRoco 2, and Sonic Unleashed on day two of GameSpot's special TGS show.

item.title: On the Spot - 10/09/08
item.author: support@gamespot.com
item.description: Today we are bringing you the first of two live shows this week, featuring all that is happening at TGS 2008. Little Big Planet returns to show off some of the amazing user-generated levels that you just have to see, and of course we've got the ever-present trivia giveaway. But first we're going to check in with our crew in Tokyo, Japan, who are On the Spot!

item.author: support@gamespot.com
item.description: We celebrate 11 years of Jeff Gerstmann while addressing issues concerning the state of GameSpot. No, this isn't a must-see, dirt-revealing, secret-busting expose, unless you mean in terms of revealing what the heck Ninja Reflex is. We've also got some friends coming by to show us Universe at War. If that's not enough (and we know it's not), we've got Schizoid, NiGHTS: Journey of Dreams, and more, all packed into a monstrous On the Spot!
